jinngine.util
Interface ComponentGraph.ComponentHandler<T,V>

Enclosing interface:
ComponentGraph<T,U,V>
public static interface ComponentGraph.ComponentHandler<T,V>

Interface for supplying custom component objects. Components are used to reference the independently connected components in the graph. It is therefore useful to be able to store user information within the component references.

Method Summary
 void mergeComponent(V remaining, V leaving)
          Called prior to two components being merged.
 V newComponent()
          Called when a new component is created.
 void nodeAddedToComponent(V component, T node)
          Called when a node is added to some component
 void nodeRemovedFromComponent(V component, T node)
          Called when a node is removed from some component
 

Method Detail

newComponent

V newComponent()
Called when a new component is created. This call MUST return a unique object of type V, that has not been previously known to the ComponentGraph

Returns:
a new unique component of type V

mergeComponent

void mergeComponent(V remaining,
                    V leaving)
Called prior to two components being merged. This gives the user a way to manipulate data in the component type V. During this call, it is possible to access the data of the ComponentGraph in a read-only fashion.

Parameters:
remaining - The component that will be the union of both components after merge
disappearing - The component that will be removed from the graph

nodeAddedToComponent

void nodeAddedToComponent(V component,
                          T node)
Called when a node is added to some component

nodeRemovedFromComponent

void nodeRemovedFromComponent(V component,
                              T node)
Called when a node is removed from some component
